timeline.message:
Auto-generate server URLs

* probably won't auto-select, oh well

Laggard junit update

* do not know why develop is able to build

timeline.bodyText: So this one will kick in if we for example create a perf.dockstore.net?
timeline.author: coverbeck
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,6 +14,22 @@ info:
     name: Apache License Version 2.0
     url: https://github.com/dockstore/dockstore/blob/develop/LICENSE
   version: 1.9.0-alpha.1-SNAPSHOT
+servers:
+- url: /api

replies.bodyText: My belief is yes, the first choice should kick in and work for any openapi.yaml that is hosted on a server at /api/openapi,yaml which it should be (?) for any thing we deploy using our compose setup/cloud formation approach.
replies.author: denis-yuen
